name: Glider Classic
description:
The Macintosh classic re-imagined for iOS.

Fly your paper airplane through a house relying on lift from air vents in the floor.

Duck under obstacles, avoid electrical outlets and all the other hazards that await your fragile glider.

– iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch
– artwork designed for the Retina display (iPad and iPhone)
– easy to play and learn, a challenge to master

Have fun exploring the house!
